AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hive child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the hive.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] never ventured from its resinous walls before adulthood.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: test subject
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a sterile place of blinding light.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] was always watched by strange prey from behind solid walls.[PAWN_pronoun] watched and learned.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ship born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a world of metal surrounded by emptiness.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] slipped through the tunnels of [PAWN_pronoun] home.[PAWN_pronoun] hunted these halls.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: wild born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the wilderness.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] stalked forest, field and desert for prey.[PAWN_pronoun] ate the flesh of beasts.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tamed nymph
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was tended to and taught after [PAWN_possessive] birth.\n This person educated and trained [PAWN_possessive] in many things.[PAWN_pronoun] has fond memories of them.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: abused nymph
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was kept captive after [PAWN_possessive] birth.\n This person abused and tormented [PAWN_possessive].[PAWN_pronoun] had her vengeance though.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: sacrifice born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the chest of a willing human sacrifice, on the rim a great many cultures, tribal or otherwise practice human sacrifice and it is from the ranks of one of these tribes that the donor for [PAWN_nameDef] genome arises.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: cleansed survivor
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to emerge early from a corpse being thrown on a pyre, narrowly escaping death.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: fearful child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] could not adapt well enough to live well in their environment, naturally they started becoming more isolated and fearful of other species.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: first born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: From birth [PAWN_nameDef] was the only of its kind within its environment. It succeeded in pacifying all known environmental hostiles, and progressed its life to make a hive of its own with what was available.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: arrested emergence
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Nymphs tend to burst from their hosts as early as they are able, however [PAWN_nameDef] was by a combination of necessity and adaptation able to remain a parasite for several years before finally emerging.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: resin child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Born from an otherwise dormant hive resinchildren spend their early nymph like stage consuming and regurgitating the resinous bindings and structure of their nest, ensuring things are structurally sound before metamorphosis into a newborn drone.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: intuitive child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Since birth environmental hostility was a problem, and so from the moment [PAWN_nameDef] was born they had to adapt or die with most decisions made.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bio weapon
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] lived [PAWN_possessive] entire childhood in a confided space studied for future military use leading to a fear of tight spaces, however one day [PAWN_pronoun] managed to escape by slowly clawing [PAWN_possessive] way out, once out [PAWN_pronoun] slaughtered [PAWN_possessive] captors.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: runt
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born sickly and weak, often ignored by [PAWN_possessive] siblings leading to [PAWN_possessive] being quite anti social with the rest of the hive, spending [PAWN_possessive] time alone tinkering with various human tech sprung around the hive

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: premature child
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born before [PAWN_pronoun] could finish developing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: colonyborne
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a rimworld colony which raised [PAWN_possessive] despite [PAWN_possessive] origin.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hiveborne
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a hive among [PAWN_possessive] sisters.
